Plot: Lady Alyce Marshmorton must marry soon, and the staff of Tottney Castle have laid bets on who she'll choose, with young Albert wagering on "Mr. X." After Alyce goes to London to meet a beau...
Title: A Damsel in Distress
Writer: P.G. Wodehouse (screen play), Ernest Pagano (screen play), S.K. Lauren (screen play), P.G. Wodehouse (from the story by)
Actors: Fred Astaire, George Burns, Gracie Allen, Joan Fontaine
